channel.title: What happend to the classics
channel.description:
Ok, so we all know runescape rsps's and rs to be quite modern with all their fancy new torva and curses, but what happened to all the 508 rush pk's and the 508 pvp drop servers, and... well... runescape... what a let down... ever since they took the wildy down its never been the same... for example the eco's crashed, you cant buy anything without a nub selling it for 10m more than its worth... the only good thing about rs now is the fact that they added a teleport system to each town/city with no cool down, back in the day people used to cry over loosing 1m, now you get people in GE asking for it...
What should happen? they should restart rs, keep the base of today but reset everything, make drops harder, focus less on the graphics are more on the fixes, change there shitty slow new website theme to something more classical like the RS2007 site, AND STOP MAKING IT SO MUCH LIKE WORLD OF WAR CRAFT... this new combat bar is 100% the same as world of warcrafts combat bar except their xp bar is our adrenalin bar...
The conclusion i have found when reviewing all this info is that the new makers of rs are just in it for the money, unlike the original owners who did it for the players, as you can see, adverts on rs have quadrupled membership prices have nearly doubled, wheel of fortune spins, loyalty points... all this new shit that's directed at 11 year old kids who dont know what to spend their pocket money on...
so, i want to hear some of your views on what rs has to be shamed for, after all... they dont get there nickname "Fagex" for nothing :)

item.title: What happend to the classics
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote="…::Coded::…, post:37, topic:447516"][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=550410.msg4035863#msg4035863 date=1341193685]
I just felt like saying this but today, for the first time ever. I saw an advert on my tv for runescape o.o. I was like o.OOOO but it makes it look like a 9 years old game :(stuff from the cinematic trailer).
[/quote]

I remember like years ago, the tv was on nickalodeon (however you spell it) at like 1 AM and an advertisement for a Runescape bot came on… I wasl ike WTF, though the ad was very poor quality and all blurry and shit[/quote]
lololol, what morons haha!

item.title: What happend to the classics
item.dc:creator: @_Coded ..::Coded::..
item.description:
@_Coded wrote:

World of Warcraft isn’t the first game to use an action bar, and as we can see, won’t be the last either.

These changes are for the better, it may be a shocker to hear this but Jagex needs money to continue on with runescape, without money runescape is gone.

The updates are good, all people do is bitch how how they liked old ruenscape better and they want jagex to make it like it was in 03 or 06 or some shit. If Jagex didn’t ever update the game then you would be playing the EXACT same shit for 10 years, whats the point in that?

Read full topic

item.title: What happend to the classics
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:32, topic:447516”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=550410.msg4035372#msg4035372 date=1341159517]No, you just like being completely biased about this, which is painstakingly obvious from pretty much all of your posts in this section.
[/quote]
perhaps, but from my perspective of playing post 2010, i found the game to be entirely different in its player-base. my reply was directed more at the ‘top-heavy’ and ‘people still skill’ comment. my observation was that there were far more elites (high combat/high wealth) than noobs. furthermore, most of the people i bumped into didn’t train skills. they’d be in the 120+ range with something like 50 mining…[/quote]From my own experience of having played somewhat actively for the past 3 years, my statement is still accurate. What i mean by top-heavy is that it’s one of few games where people from all level-ranges generally hang out in the same areas, and in many cases train various skills together, be it individually or through the various popular minigames.

Read full topic

item.title: What happend to the classics
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:29, topic:447516”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=550410.msg4035305#msg4035305 date=1341155582]

[quote author=Bellend link=topic=550410.msg4035276#msg4035276 date=1341153657]

Oh my… really… just really… ohhhh my fucking god… -_- facepalm
This is a discussion board… did you not read the title before entering?[/quote]
Are you retarded? Do you expect every reply on this thread to be “I agree, RS sucks”?

Sorry? Did you read my post… or did you just get thrown really hard at a brick wall as a baby?
if you would have attempted to read on, you will find you just agree’d with my statement… this is a discussion board… that means you have a debate WITHOUT getting into an argument, which near 100% of the people on this post provoked…

So i realize now that i cant discuss anything on this forum as most of the people on here dont have the will to not argue…
therefore making this topic post pointless and irrelevant…

Well bro, after that comment I just laugh at you.

Well “Bro” i have to laugh at you -_-, only 9-12 year olds use the term bro (or some really fucked up kid that has the mental age of 9-12)
your post further concludes my point, this there not a person on this forum older that the age of 16 that i can talk to with out some childish response?
i though this was more of a java development dedicated to the game RS2, not some kids forum were we all worship “RuneScape”…

Grow some balls and get out once in a while… you will see the earth is bigger than just runescape’s 2D map…

Belland: Are you serious? Is making the interface efficient the same as copying ALL MMORPGs? If anything Jagex has improved on the old display from MMORPGs. Your adrenaline bar is much more important than your XP bar and you get the info where you need it. By showing you the weakness you are saving people some time, as everybody would just look it up anyway.

Ahh finally a person who does have some sence of maturity…
And no, making that interface makes the game WOW because of the facts…

WoW Features:

  • 3D, Massive Worlds
  • More than combat skills to level
  • Trade System
  • NPC dialogues
  • Combat bar
    ect…

RS Features:

  • 3D, Massive Worlds
  • More than combat skills to level
  • Trade System
  • NPC dialogues
  • Combat bar

Now i know what your going to say “every mmo has these”, well yes… but that’s like saying that FPS’s for example are all the same because of there fetures
ammo display, guns, hit markers ect…
well no… Every game is different because the makers of it make something for the game to be distinct about…
so why is RS going to be So similar to WoW, well its because of the fact that there is nothing different…
the features are 99.5% the same…

ok right someone post back with a feature that’s not the same… then il begin to agree with your DEBATE…
[/quote]Play some other MMO’s and then come back. RS is one of maybe 4 or 5 MMO’s that specifically ARE NOT WoW-clones. Some notable things being: A more vibrant economy, hybrid skill/level based progression system with no skill caps (classless), RISK - losing items (to an extent), very little player-funneling (zone-running) and virtually no top-heavy player distribution.

Sidenote #1: Most, if not all of the features WoW has were used in Everquest several years before its release, all they did was polish them.
Sidenote #2: Non-combat skills in WoW are a secondary thing, in RS there are tons of people who EXCLUSIVELY play the game for non-combat, you cannot do this in most other mmo’s.

are you still living in 2006?..[/quote]No, you just like being completely biased about this, which is painstakingly obvious from pretty much all of your posts in this section.

Read full topic

item.title: What happend to the classics
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Bellend, post:25, topic:447516”]And no, making that interface makes the game WOW because of the facts…

WoW Features:

  • 3D, Massive Worlds
  • More than combat skills to level
  • Trade System
  • NPC dialogues
  • Combat bar
    ect…

RS Features:

  • 3D, Massive Worlds
  • More than combat skills to level
  • Trade System
  • NPC dialogues
  • Combat bar

Now i know what your going to say “every mmo has these”, well yes… but that’s like saying that FPS’s for example are all the same because of there fetures
ammo display, guns, hit markers ect…
well no… Every game is different because the makers of it make something for the game to be distinct about…
so why is RS going to be So similar to WoW, well its because of the fact that there is nothing different…
the features are 99.5% the same…

ok right someone post back with a feature that’s not the same… then il begin to agree with your DEBATE…[/quote]

What defines a MMORPG:

  • XD, Massive Worlds
  • More than combat skills to level. (You should have some crafting professions)
  • Trade System (You can’t have an economy without trading)
  • NPC dialogues
  • Combat interface.

It is not about that every MMORPG have it, it is about that every MMORPG must have it to fit the genre.

Read full topic

item.title: What happend to the classics
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Well bro, after that comment I just laugh at you.

Just because you think its turning into WOW doesn’t mean their copying. All they are doing is making there game better and on par with the other MMO’S. If you really think WOW is better, which it looks like you do because that’s all you fucking mention, then fuck off to WOW and stop complaining.

LOL?!? your an idiot... you think its just me who lost intrest in this game? half of fucking youtube agree's with me... in fact... no i take that back, i didn't loose interest, i still like the game, but its like dharok amour... when you first get it, its brilliant and strong... but as time go's on it degrades and then you have to repair it for it to improve again... and yeah it was exiting in the classic days where i shit my self to loose 25k to a goblin, but that's what made the game fun... risk... now i laugh at loosing 10m in a duel and just think 'oh, nvm il just get another 10m' and yeah i did find the game more fun back then because everything was new, but that statement contradicts your point... you just said that i dont like the game because its not new to me, but you say the world map his huge now? and more content is going to be added / is already added? please think about what your saying before you make your self look so stupid... im not the ignorant one you are... im just making a discussion pointing all the bad thing out and stating how they could be improved, your turning this into an argument... and yeah they are making it like wow, example:


This is wows bar, it dispaly all attacks availible with the xp, and the opposition info in the green context menu…
now look at this:

rs’s bar with all attacks displayed

context menu/interface with opposition info

Sorry what’s that, the new updates not like wow? if you cant see the the 95.5% resemblance then you really need to consult an optician about your vision…

-Half of YT don’t even play RS, WTF are u on?
-Barrows have always degraded, why are you complaining. If you dislike repairing, don’t use it.
-Don’t blame Jagex for the way money has turned out in this game because they have no part of it, It’s the players.
-Half of that doesn’t make sense. GJ
-All he is doing is discussing his opinions yet you go raging because there completely the opposite.
-WOW didn’t make everything sorry to tell you.

item.title: What happend to the classics
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:18, topic:447516”]RS is just making changes to try to appeal to a broader audience. Comparing it to WoW and saying its becoming a WoW clone is taking it a bit to far tho imo. Just because RS is adapting certain qualities that ALL mmo games have (not just WoW mind you) is not a bad thing considering its something that when added and perfected will make RS more enjoyable in the long run. In the end who cares? Are you really going to make threads bashing a game you don’t enjoy anymore due to a few updates that didn’t appeal to you? and what will you get out of it? RS isn’t going to go back to what it used to be, the developers are trying to push the game forward in all departments not take it back.

And to touch on the money subject, Jagex believe it or not is a business (I KNOW UNBELIEVABLE RIGHT?) and has every right to try to make the most they can on their product. Sure some of their moves may not be the brightest but in the long run the money goes back into the game and aids in development of something that many people enjoy and continue to play good updates or bad.[/quote]

Oh my… really… just really… ohhhh my fucking god… -_- facepalm
This is a discussion board… did you not read the title before entering?

Are you really going to make threads bashing a game you don't enjoy anymore due to a few updates that didn't appeal to you? and what will you get out of it? RS isn't going to go back to what it used to be, the developers are trying to push the game forward in all departments not take it back.
This is like saying "why does every one complain about flamers, there not going to stop just because people rant at them" OBVIOUSLY NOT, that's not the point in a discussion... we complain because THERE'S SOMETHING TO FUCKING COMPLAIN ABOUT... like im complaining about you now... does this mean your going to suddenly join my views? NO, but im still complaining at you? and yeah they might be a business, but DOES THAT STOP ME FROM MY VIEWS? just lessen to what im going to say, and lessen hard you pathetic 9 year old child who think's he knows it all... once you get some friends, Yes FRIENDS add that word to your dictionary... you will realise that there might be something in life that you dont like.... yeah hard to imagine right? and someday you will make a conversation on the topic with your FRIENDS... this is called SOCIALIZING.... (<- talking to another form of the same spices)...

for example… people in working class counties complain at their governments because they give benefits to people who dont need them, and cut peoples pensions down…
now ranting on about the government wont change their mind… but people still do it? are you starting to get the idea now?

Ohh and FYI i dont hate Runescape, in fact i play it today… i just dont like some features/or most of what they have done to it…

also… you say that this update will be good in the long run?.. how do you know? its not even been released… it might destroy the game even more…

Now… if you want to add something to this DISCUSSION without being a sarcastic little basterd, please do… i dont mind people sharing there views or disagreeing with me, but when you direct your argument at me, il come right back at you in spite…

Read full topic

item.title: What happend to the classics
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

RS is just making changes to try to appeal to a broader audience. Comparing it to WoW and saying its becoming a WoW clone is taking it a bit to far tho imo. Just because RS is adapting certain qualities that ALL mmo games have (not just WoW mind you) is not a bad thing considering its something that when added and perfected will make RS more enjoyable in the long run. In the end who cares? Are you really going to make threads bashing a game you don’t enjoy anymore due to a few updates that didn’t appeal to you? and what will you get out of it? RS isn’t going to go back to what it used to be, the developers are trying to push the game forward in all departments not take it back.

And to touch on the money subject, Jagex believe it or not is a business (I KNOW UNBELIEVABLE RIGHT?) and has every right to try to make the most they can on their product. Sure some of their moves may not be the brightest but in the long run the money goes back into the game and aids in development of something that many people enjoy and continue to play good updates or bad.

Read full topic

item.title: What happend to the classics
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Bellend:

LOL?!? your an idiot… you think its just me who lost intrest in this game? half of fucking youtube agree’s with me… in fact… no i take that back, i didn’t loose interest, i still like the game, but its like dharok amour… when you first get it, its brilliant and strong… but as time go’s on it degrades and then you have to repair it for it to improve again…

This doesn’t make any sense, so dharok degrades and always had, what is your point?

and yeah it was exiting in the classic days where i shit my self to loose 25k to a goblin, but that's what made the game fun... risk... now i laugh at loosing 10m in a duel and just think 'oh, nvm il just get another 10m'
Blame the people who started the whole gambling scene, not the game.
and yeah i did find the game more fun back then because everything was new, but that statement contradicts your point... you just said that i dont like the game because its not new to me, but you say the world map his huge now? and more content is going to be added / is already added?
What I meant to say is, you get sick of playing the same game all the time no matter what kind of changes come, that varies by different people.
please think about what your saying before you make your self look so stupid... im not the ignorant one you are... im just making a discussion pointing all the bad thing out and stating how they could be improved, your turning this into an argument...
This is a discussion thread and there must be atleast some arguments between the members, not everyone thinks the same as you and would like to share their thoughts.
Sorry what's that, the new updates not like wow? if you cant see the the 95.5% resemblance then you really need to consult an optician about your vision...
Yes, because WoW is the almighty god of all MMORPGs right? Almighty WoW thought of everything. Even if it looks similar to it, what is bothering you so much about it?

item.title: What happend to the classics
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:9, topic:447516”][quote author=Bellend link=topic=550410.msg4034422#msg4034422 date=1341075584]
Who said i was expecting them to do anything? it was my opinion of what would make the game better…
and yeah so what if there a business, the customer is always right… and yeah they can evolve like every other game, but why destroy it just because your spoilt for cash? for example, the average player count each day in 2007 was about 150k and its the same today… so really what have they achieved? in fact they have lost players as about 75k of them today are botters… people dont play games because they look good, they play games because they are good… but from the posts i have seen on this topic its quite obvious that most of you didn’t start playing until the revision 508 or you would know this…
[/quote]1. They are not making it like World of Warcraft.
2. There’s nothing wrong with the game (except the presence of bots for now), stop grinding skills/pking for a second and do some quests, kill some stuff for drops and you will see the game is worth something, the world map is huge at the moment and I’m pretty sure it will keep growing giving us more stuff to do.
3. Most of us here did start before the 508 revision, some even from the first RS2 days. You only miss the old times because that was the time where you first found the game and everything was new explorable where even the slightest bit of GP would make you cry of happiness, with the time passing by you grow out of the game and it gets boring. People like you are too ignorant to realise that it’s not the game, it’s just you who lost interest.[/quote]

LOL?!? your an idiot… you think its just me who lost intrest in this game? half of fucking youtube agree’s with me… in fact… no i take that back, i didn’t loose interest, i still like the game, but its like dharok amour… when you first get it, its brilliant and strong… but as time go’s on it degrades and then you have to repair it for it to improve again… and yeah it was exiting in the classic days where i shit my self to loose 25k to a goblin, but that’s what made the game fun… risk… now i laugh at loosing 10m in a duel and just think ‘oh, nvm il just get another 10m’ and yeah i did find the game more fun back then because everything was new, but that statement contradicts your point… you just said that i dont like the game because its not new to me, but you say the world map his huge now? and more content is going to be added / is already added? please think about what your saying before you make your self look so stupid… im not the ignorant one you are… im just making a discussion pointing all the bad thing out and stating how they could be improved, your turning this into an argument… and yeah they are making it like wow, example:


This is wows bar, it dispaly all attacks availible with the xp, and the opposition info in the green context menu…
now look at this:

rs’s bar with all attacks displayed

context menu/interface with opposition info

Sorry what’s that, the new updates not like wow? if you cant see the the 95.5% resemblance then you really need to consult an optician about your vision…
